sentence.Network_en: The cattleman was caught in a stampede of dollars.
sentence.Network_cn: 金钱劈头盖脑地落到牧牛人身上.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 同等学力英语高频词速记 - 豆丁网 ... farmer n. 农民，农场主 cattleman n. 牧场主人 cowboy n. 牛仔；牧场骑士.
美国大学翻译中文52_书面语语_DuSystem... ... 牧牛业者 cowman 牧牛人 cattleman 牧牛者 cowherd.

entry.tran: (尤指北美或澳洲的)养牛人，牧牛工人，牧牛场场主
entry.def: A cattleman is a man who looks after or owns cattle, especially in North America or Australia.

means.word_mean: 1. a man who raises (or tends) cattle
2. a hired hand who tends cattle and performs other duties on horseback

auth_sentence.content: Imagine a cattleman having a finite amount of pasture that keeps twice the amount of cattle the pasture can feed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Imagine a cattleman having a finite amount of pasture that keeps twice the amount of cattle the pasture can feed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Imagine a cattleman having a finite amount of pasture that keeps twice the amount of cattle the pasture can feed.

auth_sentence.content: " He says it's a bad idea for a cattleman to get attached to his livestock, but, "most of these cows have names.
